Class Race

  • java.lang.Object
    • Race

  • public class Race
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the ability to simulate a number of car objects racing around a race track. In particular, it can determine which car is leading the race after every lap.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    King's College London

      Car determineRaceLeader()
      Identifies which of the cars is leading the race, which is the one with the lowest total time taken in race so far.
